page.title: 15MILTON OF ARDLETHEN.
page.content: A mixed{arable farm,}covering an area of 600 acres consisting of{dairy cows, {root and cereal crops.}The farmer works a 9 hour day with 6 full time workers. His main job being supervising and general management. He owns{3 tractors, silage equipment, {ploughs, cultivators, potato harvester {a grain drier and sprayer and milking {equipment}for a dairy parlour. The percentage of land used for the crops are barley{57%,}grass{25%, potatoes{10%,}turnips{4%}and wheat{4% with the field boundaries of dry-stane dykes topped with wooden fencing. Both man made and natural drainage are employed on the farm. The oldest building is 35 years old - the farmhouse. There are{two potato {store, two grain and three silage {stores, a milking shed, two cattle {buildings}and an all purpose building.
